Module utcn.ordermanagement
Package utcn.ordermanagement.data_access.repository

Interface ICrudRepository<Model,ID>

Type Parameters:
Model - The type of the model/entity managed by the repository.
ID - The type of the identifier of the model/entity.
All Superinterfaces:
IRepository<Model,ID>
All Known Subinterfaces:
IClientRepository, IOrderRepository, IProductRepository, IUserRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRepository, CrudRepository, OrderRepository, ProductRepository, UserRepository
public interface ICrudRepository<Model,ID> extends IRepository<Model,ID>
Interface representing a generic CRUD repository for database operations.

  • Method Details

    • update

      Model update(Model model) throws SQLException
      Updates the provided model/entity in the repository.
      Parameters:
      model - The model/entity to update.
      Returns:
      The updated model/entity.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteById

      boolean deleteById(ID id) throws SQLException
      Deletes a model/entity by its identifier from the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the model/entity to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
